CustomField.formula: IF(Placement_Site__r.BillingStreet <> NULL, Placement_Site__r.BillingStreet + " " + Placement_Site__r.BillingCity + ", " + Placement_Site__r.BillingState + " " + Placement_Site__r.BillingPostalCode + ", " + Placement_Site__r.BillingCountry, NULL)
CustomField.label: Job Site Address
